extDescription.message: TabMark is a bookmark-based new tab page application that helps you efficiently organize and access your bookmarks.

welcomeMessage.description: Welcome message displayed to the user

searchPlaceholder.message: Press Enter to search, or Cmd/Ctrl + Enter to search all search engines
searchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the search input

editNameLabel.description: Label for the name input in the edit dialog

editUrlLabel.description: Label for the URL input in the edit dialog

confirmDeleteMessage.message: Are you sure you want to delete "$1"?
confirmDeleteMessage.description: Message to confirm deletion of an item

confirmDeleteButton.description: Text for the confirm delete button

openInNewTab.description: Context menu item to open link in new tab

openInNewWindow.description: Context menu item to open link in new window

openInIncognito.description: Context menu item to open link in incognito window

editQuickLink.description: Context menu item to edit quick link

deleteQuickLink.description: Context menu item to delete quick link

copyLink.description: Context menu item to copy link

createQRCode.description: Context menu item to create QR code

confirmDeleteBookmark.message: Are you sure you want to delete the bookmark "$1"?
confirmDeleteBookmark.description: Confirmation message for deleting a bookmark

setAsHomepage.description: Option to set a page as homepage

confirmDeleteFolder.message: Are you sure you want to delete the folder "$1"?
confirmDeleteFolder.description: Confirmation message for deleting a folder

categoryDeleted.description: Notification message when a category is deleted

searchEngineIconNotFound.description: Error message when search engine icon is not found

folderDeleted.description: Log message when a folder is deleted

confirmDeleteMessage.message: Are you sure you want to delete "$1"?
confirmDeleteMessage.description: Confirmation message for deleting an item

linkCopied.description: Toast message when a link is successfully copied

copyLinkFailed.description: Toast message when copying a link fails

invalidBookmark.description: Toast message when trying to copy an invalid bookmark

copied.description: Text shown after a link is copied

confirmDeleteTitle.description: Title for the confirm delete dialog

scanQRCode.description: Title for the QR code modal

renameFolderTitle.description: Title for the rename folder dialog

floatingBallDescription.message: When enabled, a clickable floating icon will appear in the upper right corner of the page for quick access to search engines and bookmarks.

confirmDeleteQuickLinkMessage.message: Are you sure you want to delete the quick link "$1"? This link will no longer appear in the quick links list.
confirmDeleteQuickLinkMessage.description: Confirmation message for deleting a quick link

searchEngineUpdateTip.message: Search engine switching feature has been updated

searchEngineUpdateDetail.message: Now click the search icon to set the default search engine, use the tab bar for temporary switching

uploadedWallpaperBadge.description: Badge text for user uploaded wallpaper

imageSizeExceeded.message: Image size exceeds limit (max 10MB), please choose a smaller image

fileReadError.message: Failed to read file, please try again

lowResolutionWarning.message: Image resolution is too low, recommend using at least $1 x $2 for best results

imageLoadError.message: Failed to load image, please try another one

storageError.message: Storage space insufficient, please clear some space and try again

wallpaperSetError.message: Failed to set wallpaper, please try again

aboutDescription.message: TabMark is a clean and efficient bookmark management extension that helps you better organize and access your web collections.

version.description: The version number of the application

settingsUpdateTip.message: You can set background color, wallpaper, floating ball, site recommendations, and bookmark cleanup here...

deleteSuccess.description: Toast message when an item is successfully deleted

quickLinksDescription.message: When enabled, your most frequently visited websites will be displayed below the search box for easy access. The recommendation list will automatically update as you visit new sites.

namePrompt.description: Prompt message when asking for user's name

openAllBookmarks.description: Context menu option to open all bookmarks in a folder

bookmarkCleanupTitle.description: Title of the bookmark cleanup link

bookmarkCleanupNotInstalled.message: You haven't installed the Bookmark Cleanup extension. Would you like to install it from the Chrome Web Store?
bookmarkCleanupNotInstalled.description: Prompt to install the bookmark cleanup extension

bookmarkCleanupFeature.message: New bookmark cleanup feature: Click the settings icon in the sidebar, install the bookmark cleanup extension to easily clean up duplicate and invalid bookmarks. You can also see your bookmark statistics.

bookmarkCleanupSettingsDescription.message: Clean up duplicate and invalid bookmarks, view bookmark usage statistics to help you better manage your bookmarks.

openBookmarkCleanup.description: Button text to open bookmark cleanup tool
